segments.text: Bill , do you know if the cafeteria around the corner's open today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . They were open this morning when I came to work . They must've finished remodeling . Why do you want to know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I thought that maybe we could go there for lunch today . That is , if you haven't promised to go with someone else .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That'd be wonderful , Peter . But I hope you're in a better mood than you were this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry I was such a grouch . It must've been the weather . When it rains I get depressed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Forget it . I'll see you at 11:30 am .
segments.speaker: S2
